GSD.product_version: versions from v4.7 to before v5.10.137
GSD.description:
mtd: maps: Fix refcount leak in ap_flash_init

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.10.137 by commit 941ef6997f9db704fe4fd62fc01e420fdd5048b2, it was introduced in version v4.7 by commit b0afd44bc192ff4c0e90a5fc1724350bcfc32b33. For more details please see the references link.
